location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Sir Evan Nepean, Baronet, President and Governor in Council, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is reporting that the missing Country Ship Rhaim Shaw(the Resident seeks to find and return her to Bushire) has been sighted off the Arabian coast; noted to be a dangerous region. The HC Cruizer Ternatehas been sent to Bussora [Basra] in search of her, and will pursue any leads it finds.
